name: In search of HD
description:
Objective: obtain fuel (100 units) to leave with your ship, while defending your ship from invaders.

You can interact with the scenario by pressing w or up arrow, getting the right amount of energy and ores you can create clones of yourself, use your clones to build defense towers against invaders, you can build the towers by pressing w or up arrow, at the bottom of the destroyed tower, with 2 clones it is possible to build an entire tower, and thus the clones become the tower.

Controls:

 Use A and D or left arrow and right arrow to move left or right.

Use up arrow or W to interact.

Use down arrow or S to close the interaction panel.

Use esc to open and close the menu.

Story:

 you are the last robot of its kind and are looking for a group of HD's that are spread throughout the universe and that hold the key to the creation of other intelligent robots like you, but you have to stop on a planet to collect resources It is fuel for your ship, and uses a machine to cope with its physical structure to create a robot with basic artificial intelligence, which is to transform into towers to defend the ship from invaders.
